name: cricketfacts
0:
”Alexa open cricket facts”
”Alexa ask cricket facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell cricket facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket facts
des:
Ask for Cricket Facts, and learn about what really matters, like which batsman has hit the first ball of a test match for 6.

Cricket Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
